thread.title: Jamie Carragher had his birthday ruined by Liverpool defeat - and Gary Neville obviously loved it
thread.title_full: Jamie Carragher had his birthday ruined by Liverpool defeat - and Gary Neville obviously loved it

author: Mark Jones
title: Jamie Carragher had his birthday ruined by Liverpool defeat - and Gary Neville obviously loved it
text:
Yep, they've been at it again Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
No Liverpool fan had a good day on Saturday, but Jamie Carragher had a really bad one. 
Because not only did the former Reds defender have to hear news that his old club had suffered a shock FA Cup fourth round defeat at home to Wolves, but that loss only went and ruined his birthday. 
Yep, the Sky Sports pundit turned 39 on Saturday, but news of the Reds' loss to the Championship side soured his day somewhat, and he wasn't shy of telling people about it. Happy birthday Carra - could have gone better though, eh? (Photo: AFP) The men who ruined Carragher's birthday (Photo: Alex Livesey) 
Within minutes of the full-time whistle blowing at Anfield - and with Carragher doubtlessly receiving plenty of tweets mocking the Reds - he told his 965,000 followers - with his tongue in his cheek - that he hadn't seen the game on his big day because it wasn't on Sky. (Photo: Jamie Carragher Twitter / @Carra23) 
And when Carragher isn't happy about something, it isn't soon before his punditry partner pops up to rub it in a bit more. 
Sure enough, Gary Neville was soon on hard to inform his 'mate' about the match, as well as wish him an unhappy birthday on what was clearly an unhappy day. (Photo: Gary Neville Twitter / @GNev2) 
Twitter just wouldn't be Twitter without these two going at each other, would it? poll loading Who is the better pundit? 3000+ VOTES SO FAR
